tossup_question: -   –  For each of the following three situations, identify whether the collision is elastic or inelastic: 1) Molecules of an ideal gas colliding; 2) Two cars running into each other; 3) A basketball hitting a wall and returning.
bonus_question: -   –   The reason you are safe in your car during a lightning storm is because the
bonus_answer: ANSWER: FARADAY CAGE (DO NOT ACCEPT: SHIELDING)
